title: Report: Man shot while walking home in Madisonville
content:
HOPKINS CO., KY (WFIE) -
Police are investigating after a man was shot Sunday evening in Madisonville.
According to a police report, the man told officers he was walking home from the basketball courts at Festus Clayborn Park when he heard a distance gunshot and then felt an impact on his back.
The man was able to get all the way home where he had a friend drive him to the hospital. He was treated and released.
Police are asking anyone with information about what happened to call them at (270) 824-2121 or Crime Stoppers at (270) 825-1111.
